subject: Add platform, OS, referrer, and session duration to install tracking
body:
Enriches the app_install GA4 event with additional context:
- platform (mobile/desktop)
- os (ios/android/windows/macos/linux)
- referrer (where the user came from)
- session_duration (seconds from page load to install)

https://claude.ai/code/session_015XJcpvmaUAWnwQuvFi6Wy1
title: Add platform, OS, referrer, and session duration to install tracking
